wikipedia_page.main: Ella Clark (born 8 February 1992) is a British female professional basketball and netball player.

response: Clark is from a well-known British basketball family, his father Mark coached the GB national women’s team from 2006–09 and his mother played for the national team. His sister Ella Clark is also an international basketball player.CHINGFORD FOUNDATION SCHOOL PE DEPARTMENT Hall of Fame Clark decided to reject the chance to play college basketball in the United States and instead opted to accept an invitation to play at the academy of Spanish ACB club, CB Estudiantes. Before this, he attended Chingford Foundation School.
